effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 591,322.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 378 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 869 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 869 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Mantle of Crimson Blades

spells.description:
Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of Gilneas.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
